testsuites.type: Prepositions that are made with two words.
testsuites.author: Golam Mortuza Hossain

sentence.english: You cannot work according to the rules.
sentence.expected_bengali: আপনি নিয়ম অনুসারে কাজ করতে পারেন না।

testsuites.sentence: You cannot work according to the rules.

sentence.english: They are protesting ahead of the conference.

testsuites.sentence: They are protesting ahead of the conference.

sentence.english: Aside from the mild fever, the patient feels well.
sentence.expected_bengali: মৃদু জ্বর ছাড়া, রুগী ভাল অনুভব করে।

testsuites.sentence: Aside from the mild fever, the patient feels well.
